Articles.Content:
Hello there!!! I've recently started to use KSP Interstellar again, so I thought it would be fun to see your contaptions maybe using warp drives, maybe fusion powered engines and maybe thermal turbojets? Maybe you have some cool millitary interplanetary troop tansport or maybe an antimatter refuelling space station around Jool? Show it off there (if you want to)!!!

For an example here's my WIP cargo lifting SSTO:

![DSRwz2T.png](http://i.imgur.com/DSRwz2T.png)

It hs two 2.5m thermal turbojet engines combined with two fusion reactors of the same size. It passed it's first tests, I got it to the orbit but crashed on landing ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

A sneaky thermal turbojet... with an antimatter reactor.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/31It1)

> 
> A sneaky thermal turbojet... with an antimatter reactor.
> [http://imgur.com/a/31It1](http://imgur.com/a/31It1)

Heh, smart thing
